description:
Centennial Park offers many things to the city residents of Moncton. Off the gravel paths are nice single track paths plus a nice bit of work with ramps, jumps and berms.  Nice bit of urban fun when you want a short workout in the city.
I'm not sure how long the circuit of trails goes, but It's a bit of a taste of mtn bking while enjoying a great city park.
directions: From the parking lot off of St. Georges Blvd. and to the left of Centennial Park Road.
title: Centennial Park Mtn bike trails
